channel.title: Fully functional update server
channel.description:
yeah just finished it because i was bored. go ahead and try it out i want to see if it gets any bugs along the way. only thing i did to this client was uncomment the jaggrab and crc stuff as well as make it connect to my computer. also i have update server running of 43596 for less spam.
[img]http://silabsoft.no-ip.org/winrar.PNG[/img]
http://silabsoft.no-ip.org/renamedClient.rar
